message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe is worth a lot to the right person. I'm open to offers, but I'd like to start with $20000. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective. While $15000 is my absolute minimum, I'm willing to meet you a little bit in the middle. How about $17500? I believe this product has a lot of value for you, and I'm confident it'll be worth the investment.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $17500 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $16000, but that's as high as I can go. I really think that's a fair price for the product.
